metadata.title: CVE-2021-30526 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Out of bounds write in TabStrip in Google Chrome prior to 91.0.4472.77allowed an attacker who convinced a user to install a malicious extensionto perform an out of bounds memory write via a crafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
